remarks: A group homomorphism is injective if and only if its kernel is zero. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 16-Jun-2011.)
statement:
grpkerinj.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpkerinj.2 $e |- W = ( GId ` G ) $.
grpkerinj.3 $e |- Y = ran H $.
grpkerinj.4 $e |- U = ( GId ` H ) $.
grpokerinj $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ H e. GrpOp /\ F e. ( G GrpOpHom H ) ) -> ( F : X -1-1-> Y <-> ( `' F " { U } ) = { W } ) ) $.
